title: Monday, March 20, 2017
description: There is no knock on the door, just the sound of a SWAT team smashing through it. Times reporter Kevin Sack talks about his year-long investigation into a controversial police tactic. For more information on today’s episode, visit http://nyti.ms/2nAHfHi.
author: thedaily@nytimes.com (The New York Times)
